name: Super Duper
description:
***HTML5 Version should work just fine but try the Windows Download below if you have any issues and see if that works better!***

CONTROLS

  • ESC - press to skip through story or hold to skip all
  • BACKSPACE - return to main menu
  • MOUSE 1 - click to interact with player and buttons

Our boy Steve is a mage and can duplicate himself!  Or.. is it a true duplication?

The turn order is Player and then Enemy.  All players get to move once before the enemy turn.

When using a skill, click the skill and then a highlighted square.  If there are no highlighted squares then you cannot use the skill (maybe there are no targets in range).

When duplicating, click a highlighted square for each created duplicate.  If the selected player's HP is even, you will duplicate in two.  If the HP is odd, you will duplicate more than two.

Play around and see how everything works (right now anyway)!

TWITTER   -   YOUTUBE
